ComicInfo.Title: Nothing is Real; The Arnold Homecastle Story; Information Acres; Fun with Uncle Diddums!; Anus 'n' Andy; It Was an Accident!!; Hungry 4 Love; I Must Be a Genius; That Big, New Trend; Aching in the 80's; The Girl With the Gills; D'Keeriko County; President Doody; A Night on the Town!

ComicInfo.Summary:
Bartlett reflects on how Lennon and his music affected him
The story of a Marxist accountant who one day decides to do his part for the revolution by abusing his office beverage privileges.
Private eye Organ Trail tries to find out who murdered Garfield.
